channel.title: Download speed testing
channel.description: Why is it when I go to the speedtest.net it shows like 50-65 mbps but when I go to any other download stresser site it says like 20mb? o.o

item.title: Download speed testing
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:13, topic:520089”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=638583.msg4309012#msg4309012 date=1370435517]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=638583.msg4308996#msg4308996 date=1370425804]
Did a side by side:

Yes, they are the exact same server.
[/quote]I figured so.

You must also realize the site you’re downloading from may set a limit at which you can download from.
[/quote]true which makes me wonder if it’s worth paying for a 50mbps connection cause I haven’t seen ANY site yet that actually downloads at that speed. :rolleyes:

I would have stopped at 30-40. I think 50 is a bit over-kill. In a few years from now 50 will be the standard anyways.[/quote]

It depends on the country, Sweden’s standard is 100 I believe. I even have the option for 250 where I live but I don’t need anywhere near that speed.

Read full topic

item.title: Download speed testing
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:12, topic:520089”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=638583.msg4308996#msg4308996 date=1370425804]
Did a side by side:

Yes, they are the exact same server.
[/quote]I figured so.

[quote author=Jmood link=topic=638583.msg4308972#msg4308972 date=1370412130]
You must also realize the site you’re downloading from may set a limit at which you can download from.
[/quote]true which makes me wonder if it’s worth paying for a 50mbps connection cause I haven’t seen ANY site yet that actually downloads at that speed. :rolleyes:[/quote]

I would have stopped at 30-40. I think 50 is a bit over-kill. In a few years from now 50 will be the standard anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Download speed testing
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:8, topic:520089”]http://speedtest.comcast.net/

Chances are though you’re paying for “up to” 50mbps. Meaning they don’t have to give you the full speed. Unless it’s noted otherwise.

Your isp will have an even better program for testing sync rates(probably for their eyes only). It may very well get 50mbps where you probably wouldn’t see it on speedtest.net[/quote]that’s interesting I am going to read up more on the agreement my dad is currently using with them.

Read full topic

item.title: Download speed testing
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

XFINITY Speed Test

XFINITY Speed Test

XFINITY Speed Test tests your Internet connection speed

Chances are though you’re paying for “up to” 50mbps. Meaning they don’t have to give you the full speed. Unless it’s noted otherwise.

Your isp will have an even better program for testing sync rates(probably for their eyes only). It may very well get 50mbps where you probably wouldn’t see it on speedtest.net

Read full topic

item.title: Download speed testing
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:5, topic:520089”]Closer you are to the servers faster the speed?[/quote]I do realize that My point is though I just find it shady that I can go to Atlanta, GA server on speedtest and get one reading and go to several other sites and go to an Atlanta, GA server and it’s entirely different stories.

[quote=“Travas, post:6, topic:520089”]I don’t know why you are complaining about 20mbps anyway, I for the most part can’t even get over 1mbps :([/quote]Trust me when I say I have been in your shoes however I am a stickler for getting the services I paid for and in this case when I am promised 50mbps…I am making dog gone sure I am getting 50mbps.

Read full topic

item.title: Download speed testing
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:3, topic:520089”]On speedtest, use a few different servers and just average it out yourself.

Usually your ISP has their own Speedtest thing, just ask them for it.[/quote]well comcast swears they “own speedtest”

[quote=“Tutorial, post:2, topic:520089”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=638583.msg4304519#msg4304519 date=1369544700]
Why is it when I go to the speedtest.net it shows like 50-65 mbps but when I go to any other download stresser site it says like 20mb? o.o
[/quote]
Make sure they are testing from the same server.[/quote]hmm that is strange…I am only getting about 20mbps as well on other servers but the one nearest to me gives the 50 mb. Is that intentional on their side or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Download speed testing
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

On speedtest, use a few different servers and just average it out yourself.

Usually your ISP has their own Speedtest thing, just ask them for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Download speed testing
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Loveandpower:

Why is it when I go to the speedtest.net it shows like 50-65 mbps but when I go to any other download stresser site it says like 20mb? o.o

Make sure they are testing from the same server.
